architect-contract.title: Architect Contract
architect-contract.description: Hire an architect to design your building or renovation project. Sets design scope, fees, timeline, and what happens if plans need changes.

certificate-substantial-completion.title: Certificate Substantial Completion
certificate-substantial-completion.description: Officially document that a construction project is essentially finished and ready for use, even if minor work remains.

change-order.title: Change Order
change-order.description: Modify an existing construction contract when project scope, materials, or costs need to change. Prevents disputes about extra work.

commercial-lease-agreement.title: Commercial Lease Agreement
commercial-lease-agreement.description: Rent office, retail, or industrial space for your business. More complex than residential leases with specific business terms.

commercial-lease-with-option-to-purchase.title: Commercial Lease With Option To Purchase
commercial-lease-with-option-to-purchase.description: Rent commercial space with the right to buy it later. Combines leasing and purchasing into one flexible agreement.

construction-bid-form.title: Construction Bid Form
construction-bid-form.description: Get competitive bids from contractors for your construction project. Ensures all contractors bid on the same scope of work.

construction-contract.title: Construction Contract
construction-contract.description: Hire contractors for building or renovation projects. Protects you from cost overruns, delays, and poor workmanship.

construction-management-agreement.title: Construction Management Agreement
construction-management-agreement.description: Hire a construction manager to oversee your building project. They coordinate contractors, materials, and schedules for you.

earnest-money-agreement.title: Earnest Money Agreement
earnest-money-agreement.description: Show you're serious about buying property by putting money in escrow. Protects both buyer and seller during negotiations.

eviction-notice.title: Eviction Notice
eviction-notice.description: Legally notify tenants they must leave your property. Required first step before filing eviction in court.

general-contractor-agreement.title: General Contractor Agreement
general-contractor-agreement.description: Hire a main contractor to manage your entire construction project. They handle all subcontractors, permits, and scheduling.

home-improvement-contract.title: Home Improvement Contract
home-improvement-contract.description: Hire contractors to renovate your home. Covers timeline, materials, costs, and what happens if work isn't done properly.

landscaping-contract.title: Landscaping Contract
landscaping-contract.description: Hire landscapers for yard work, garden design, or ongoing maintenance. Covers plants, materials, and seasonal services.

late-rent-notice.title: Late Rent Notice
late-rent-notice.description: Formally notify tenants their rent is overdue. Documents late payment and potential consequences like fees or eviction.

lease-addendum.title: Lease Addendum
lease-addendum.description: Add new rules or modify existing lease terms without creating a completely new lease agreement.

lease-agreement.title: Lease Agreement
lease-agreement.description: Rent out your property or rent a place to live. Sets monthly rent, rules, and responsibilities for both landlord and tenant.

lease-amendment.title: Lease Amendment
lease-amendment.description: Officially change specific terms in an existing lease, like rent amount, lease duration, or house rules.

lease-renewal-agreement.title: Lease Renewal Agreement
lease-renewal-agreement.description: Extend your current lease for another term. May include updated rent, terms, or conditions for the new period.

lease-termination-letter.title: Lease Termination Letter
lease-termination-letter.description: End a lease early or give proper notice you're moving out. Protects your security deposit and avoids legal issues.

mechanics-lien.title: Mechanics Lien
mechanics-lien.description: Secure payment for construction work by claiming a legal interest in the property. Forces property owner to pay before selling.

mechanics-lien-waiver.title: Mechanics Lien Waiver
mechanics-lien-waiver.description: Release your right to file a mechanics lien once you've been paid for construction work. Required for final payments.

mortgage-agreement.title: Mortgage Agreement
mortgage-agreement.description: Formal loan agreement for buying real estate. The property serves as collateral until the loan is fully paid off.

notice-of-lease-violation.title: Notice Of Lease Violation
notice-of-lease-violation.description: Formally notify tenants they've broken lease rules. Required first step before eviction and gives them chance to fix the problem.

notice-to-enter.title: Notice To Enter
notice-to-enter.description: Give tenants proper legal notice before entering their rental unit for inspections, repairs, or showings.

notice-to-pay-rent-or-quit.title: Notice To Pay Rent Or Quit
notice-to-pay-rent-or-quit.description: Give tenants final warning to pay overdue rent or face eviction. Required legal step before filing eviction lawsuit.

notice-to-proceed.title: Notice To Proceed
notice-to-proceed.description: Officially authorize a contractor to start work on your project. Establishes the start date and work schedule.

office-space-lease.title: Office Space Lease
office-space-lease.description: Rent office space for your business with terms specific to commercial use, including common areas and business hours.

parking-space-lease-agreement.title: Parking Space Lease Agreement
parking-space-lease-agreement.description: Rent parking spaces separately from property rental. Common in cities where parking is scarce and valuable.

property-deed.title: Property Deed
property-deed.description: Transfer ownership of real estate from one person to another. Required to legally change who owns the property.

property-manager-agreement.title: Property Manager Agreement
property-manager-agreement.description: Hire someone to manage your rental properties. They handle tenants, maintenance, and rent collection for a percentage fee.

purchase-agreement.title: Purchase Agreement
purchase-agreement.description: Buy or sell any property with clear terms. Protects both buyer and seller by defining price, conditions, and closing details.

quitclaim-deed.title: Quitclaim Deed
quitclaim-deed.description: Give up your ownership interest in property to someone else. Common in divorces or transferring property to family.

real-estate-purchase-agreement.title: Real Estate Purchase Agreement
real-estate-purchase-agreement.description: Buy or sell a house with professional terms. Includes inspections, financing contingencies, and closing procedures.

remodeling-contract.title: Remodeling Contract
remodeling-contract.description: Hire contractors to renovate specific areas of your home. Covers materials, timeline, permits, and cleanup requirements.

rent-increase-letter.title: Rent Increase Letter
rent-increase-letter.description: Notify tenants about rent increases with proper legal notice. Must follow state and local laws about timing and amounts.

rent-receipt.title: Rent Receipt
rent-receipt.description: Provide tenants with proof they paid rent on time. Protects both landlord and tenant from payment disputes.

rental-agreement.title: Rental Agreement
rental-agreement.description: Month-to-month rental arrangement with flexible terms. Easier to modify than long-term leases but less stability.

residential-lease-agreement.title: Residential Lease Agreement
residential-lease-agreement.description: Rent a house or apartment with terms that protect both tenant and landlord. Covers rent, security deposits, and house rules.

residential-rental-application.title: Residential Rental Application
residential-rental-application.description: Screen potential tenants by collecting their income, employment, and rental history. Helps you choose reliable renters.

residential-rental-inspection-report.title: Residential Rental Inspection Report
residential-rental-inspection-report.description: Document property condition before tenants move in or out. Protects security deposits and prevents damage disputes.

retail-space-lease.title: Retail Space Lease
retail-space-lease.description: Rent commercial space for your store or restaurant. Includes foot traffic considerations and signage rights.

roofing-contract.title: Roofing Contract
roofing-contract.description: Hire roofers to repair or replace your roof. Covers materials, labor, warranties, and cleanup responsibilities.

room-rental-agreement.title: Room Rental Agreement
room-rental-agreement.description: Rent out individual rooms in your house while you still live there. Covers shared spaces and house rules.

roommate-agreement.title: Roommate Agreement
roommate-agreement.description: Share living space with roommates while avoiding conflicts. Covers rent splitting, chores, guests, and house rules.

storage-space-lease-agreement.title: Storage Space Lease Agreement
storage-space-lease-agreement.description: Rent storage units for personal belongings or business inventory. Covers access hours, security, and insurance.

subcontractor-agreement.title: Subcontractor Agreement
subcontractor-agreement.description: Hire specialized workers for specific parts of your construction project. Defines their scope within the larger job.

sublease-agreement.title: Sublease Agreement
sublease-agreement.description: Rent out part of your lease to someone else, or rent from someone who's already renting. Requires original landlord approval.

tenant-maintenance-request.title: Tenant Maintenance Request
tenant-maintenance-request.description: Let tenants formally request repairs or maintenance. Creates a paper trail for landlord response times and responsibilities.

triple-net-lease.title: Triple Net Lease
triple-net-lease.description: Commercial lease where tenant pays rent plus all property expenses including taxes, insurance, and maintenance.

vacation-rental-agreement.title: Vacation Rental Agreement
vacation-rental-agreement.description: Rent your property to short-term guests for vacations. Covers check-in procedures, house rules, and damage policies.

warehouse-lease.title: Warehouse Lease
warehouse-lease.description: Rent warehouse space for storing inventory or equipment. Includes loading dock access and security requirements.

warranty-deed.title: Warranty Deed
warranty-deed.description: Transfer property ownership with guarantee that the title is clear and free of legal problems. Strongest form of deed.
